item.description:
• Wayne Haubner (SAP), A Semantic Approach to Contract Management', a preview of Wayne's SemTech presentation about applying semantics for understanding the semantics of legal contracts
  • Kenny Luck (CSAIL / MIT), Proof Examiniation in Tabulator, abulator is a firefox plugin for rendering RDF data in tabular form. Tabulator now includes an interface for browsing proofs expressed in N3 using the Truth Maintenance System (TMS) schema. This talk will include a description of the current implementation, and describe the use cases and next steps.
  • Eric Prud'hommeaux (W3C) and Fatih Turkmen (CSAIL / University of Trento), Expressing Security Policies in SPARQL
item.how_to_find_us: Star Conference Room. 4th Floor, Stata Center
item.name: The Cambridge Semantic Web June Meetup
